reasoning: FBXL4-related MTDPS13 is an autosomal recessive disorder with estimated prevalence of 1 case per 100,000-400,000 newborns. Only ~94 cases reported worldwide as of 2019 (first described in 2013). Neonatal onset, typically by 3 months of age. Extremely rare with limited epidemiological data, confidence limited by small sample size and recent discovery.
source: FBXL4-Related Encephalomyopathic Mitochondrial DNA Depletion Syndrome - GeneReviews NCBI Bookshelf; OMIM #615471
